title.narrative: 2018 Mgmt Project - E-commerce and youth employment in Africa

description.narrative: This project will aim to build coherent scenarios of how e-commerce platforms may help to address the challenges of expanding youth employment in Africa over the next decade. This work will help to connect the emerging research and knowledge around the employment effects of e-commerce platforms in China (shown in recent research by Renmin University around the Alibaba Group) and the US (where Facebook and Amazon have recently published small business impact surveys or reports) with the realities of e-commerce in Africa today.
